title: Ray-Ban Maker Sues JPMorgan, Accusing It of Failing to Catch $272 Million Theft; EssilorLuxottica says JPMorgan missed a "highly suspicious" pattern of transfers out of one of its bank accounts
text:
JPMorgan declined to comment on the lawsuit, which was filed Monday with the U.S. District Court in Manhattan.

This story will be updated.

Write to David Benoit at david.benoit@wsj.com

Ray-Ban Maker Sues JPMorgan, Accusing It of Failing to Catch $272 Million Theft
